content: I’m sure that the guilt we feel when we’re showered with abundance is also because we know that other people do not have it or don’t even know that they could have it. I know that’s true for me! And yes, I think the point the point that you make about being in favour of this discomfort is a good one, but only if we allow it to serve a good purpose in our lives, like making us more compassionate and mindful and grateful. If we entertain it as a way to prevent ourselves from receiving, then obviously it is not so good. Thank you for your insightful response!
